title: v0.3.0 — Premium Design & UX Overhaul
description: Major visual redesign transforming Clickfluencer Idle into a polished, commercial-quality idle game. This update introduces a comprehensive design system, enhanced typography, premium component styling, and improved visual hierarchy across every screen. The game now feels like a top-chart idle experience with cohesive theming, smoother animations, and professional polish throughout.
changes: Comprehensive Design System — Implemented professional typography scale with 7 heading levels and consistent font sizing
Premium Shadow System — Added game-card shadows, accent glows, and elevation levels for depth and polish
Enhanced Button Styles — New btn-primary and btn-secondary classes with micro-interactions, hover lifts, and press states
Premium Click Button — Redesigned main Post button with animated glow effect, gradient backgrounds, and shine-on-hover
Card Component Overhaul — All Generator, Upgrade, and Theme cards now use card-premium styling with better hover states
Hero Section Redesign — New animated mesh gradient background with staggered entrance animations and improved CTAs
Typography Improvements — Added gradient text for headings, stat-value and stat-label utilities for consistent number displays
Theme-Aware Gradients — All new gradients use CSS variables and rgb(from var()) for perfect theme compatibility across all 10 themes
Enhanced AdSlot Component — Future-proof ad placeholder with theme-aware styling and tasteful development indicators
About & Guide Pages Polish — Redesigned information pages with card-premium layouts and improved readability
Improved Floating Numbers — Better text shadows and drop-shadow effects for click feedback visibility
New Animation System — Added shimmer and glow keyframes for premium visual effects
Gradient Mesh Backgrounds — New bg-gradient-mesh and bg-gradient-radial utilities for hero sections
Badge System Refresh — Updated badge styles with better padding and font weights
Performance Preserved — All visual enhancements maintain existing React.memo optimizations and CSS containment
Accessibility Maintained — Focus states, ARIA labels, and reduced-motion preferences fully supported in new design system
Mobile Optimizations — Responsive typography and touch-friendly button sizes across all screen sizes
Consistent Border Radius — Unified rounded-xl and rounded-2xl usage across all interactive elements

title: Initial Release - Early Access
description: Our first public release! Clickfluencer Idle arrives with core gameplay systems, multiple generators, and responsive UI design to kickstart your influencer empire.
changes: Launch of Clickfluencer Idle
Core clicking mechanics with satisfying feedback
6 content generators (Social Media Manager, Content Creator, etc.)
Multiple permanent upgrades to boost production
9 unlockable themes with unique visual styles
Prestige system for long-term progression
Offline earnings - keep growing while away
Local save system with export/import functionality
Fully responsive design for desktop and mobile
No login required - purely browser-based gameplay

title: UI & Gameplay Upgrades
description: Our first minor patch! In this patch, we focused on improving the user interface and adding new gameplay upgrades to enhance your experience.
changes: Added Prestige display to the currency bar at all levels, showing at the start of the bar in both desktop and mobile views
Added dismiss (X) button to event toasts — can be closed visually without interrupting the running event
Upgrades now merge automatically (like theme merges) so new upgrades appear without requiring data resets
Adjusted upgrade costs for better progression balance
Lucky Charm cost scaling changed from ×10 to ×15 per tier for smoother pacing
Overnight Success cost scaling increased to ×5, starting at 25,000 creds
Cred Cache scaling increased to ×5 per tier, up to 31,250,000 for tier 6
Infinite upgrades (AI Enhancements, Better Filters) now appear at the top of the shop list
Removed Light theme's bonus multiplier and updated its description to reflect neutral balance
Quick Stats simplified — now only shows Total Clicks and Score; Prestige level moved to currency bar
Version updated to v0.2.0 Early Access for live branch claude/ui-upgrades-and-fixes-011CUiaKNaUaZCiPk3amDLrU
Build verified successfully with no errors or data resets

title: v0.2.0 — Start Page, Layout Overhaul, Achievements, and Notoriety Stores
description: Major update introducing a new unified layout, achievements system, and revamped upgrade stores to enhance gameplay and user experience.
changes: Implemented new unified layout with desktop sidebar and mobile slide-up bottom nav
Achievements tab added next to Themes with placeholder trophies (per save slot)
Split Upgrades tab into Cred Store and Notoriety Store sections
Applied monospace fonts to all stat and currency values
Introduced theme support for custom fonts, background, and icon images
Added Buy Me a Coffee donation link in Settings
Prestige threshold lowered to 1e7, preserving Themes, Infinite upgrades, and Achievements
Random events rebalanced to occur roughly every 10 minutes
Improved ×10 purchase feedback and disabled state

title: v0.2.1 — Polish, Presentation, and Prestige Prep
description: This patch focuses on presentation, UX clarity, and improving the first impression for both new and returning players. With a brand-new hero splash, marquee news bar, and deeper page structure, Clickfluencer Idle now feels more like a living web app than ever. Creds logic also received a crucial update—your displayed rate now accurately reflects notoriety upkeep costs, helping you make smarter economic decisions on your influencer journey.
changes: Added a live marquee news bar under the navigation with pause-on-hover behavior and clickable links to individual news posts
Overhauled the News system — now presented as a chronological stream with dedicated detail pages for each version
Added unique slugs for news entries and structured changelogs with titles, dates, and developer notes for easier browsing
Revised the Guide and About pages with expanded sections, cleaner formatting, and improved flow between key content areas
Introduced a themed "splash" hero section on the home page, complete with guide and update call-to-action buttons and a smooth scroll-to-game transition
Adjusted core economy display — the Creds +X.Y/s indicator now reflects notoriety upkeep, showing your true net gain per second
Improved page structure consistency and alignment across all routes (Home, Guide, About, News)
Minor polish to font rendering and color transitions for better legibility across themes
Set groundwork for future expansion systems and prestige reworks coming in v0.3.0

title: v0.2.2 — ThemeVV and Prestige Fix
description: A quick fix addressing a minor issue with the ThemeVV identifier to ensure proper functionality and consistency within the game. Further updates to ensure prestige system resets currency correctly.
changes: Corrected the ThemeVV theme ID from 'themeVV' to 'themevv' to maintain consistency with naming conventions and ensure proper theme application
Fixed an issue where prestige resets were not correctly resetting the player's currency, ensuring a proper restart of the economic progression upon prestiging
Infinite upgrades are no longer finite.

title: v0.2.3 — Save Editor & Schema Migration
description: This patch introduces a powerful Save Editor tool for advanced users and implements an important save-file schema migration for improved naming consistency. The editor allows manual customization of all game values, while the migration system ensures backward compatibility with older saves.
changes: Added full Save Editor page with import/export and manual customization
Migrated save-file keys: followers→creds, shards→awards, reputation→prestige
Automatic save-migration for backward compatibility
Save Editor now theme-compatible (warning box remains red regardless of theme)

title: v0.2.4 — Infinite Upgrade Fix, Prestige UI Improvements, and Layout Polish
description: This patch addresses a critical issue preventing players from progressing their infinite upgrades, introduces a clearer Prestige progress indicator, and applies several UI refinements for a smoother and more readable experience.
changes: Fixed a major bug preventing players from purchasing additional levels of infinite upgrades (AI Enhancements, Better Filters) due to incorrect `purchased` save-state behavior
Added new 'Next Prestige' banner that displays the required Creds for your next prestige milestone when prestige is not yet available
Improved banner spacing and layout with additional bottom padding to create clearer separation between UI sections
Improved formatting of large numbers in the prestige cost display for easier readability across themes
Added internal safeguards to prevent corrupted upgrades from blocking progression in imported save files
